block.p: BASKETBALL National Basketball Association BOSTON CELTICS--Traded G Robert Pack and F-G Calbert Cheaney to Denver for G Chris Herren and F-G Bryant Stith. CHARLOTTE HORNETS--Waived F Caswell Cyrus and Darrin Hancock. CLEVELAND CAVALIERS--Signed G Michael Hawkins. INDIANA PACERS--Named Steve Yoder college scout. PHOENIX SUNS--Waived F Carlos Daniel and F Reed Rawlings. WASHINGTON WIZARDS--Released G Brandon Titus and G Milt Palacio.

BASKETBALL National Basketball Association BOSTON CELTICS--Traded G Robert Pack and F-G Calbert Cheaney to Denver for G Chris Herren and F-G Bryant Stith. CHARLOTTE HORNETS--Waived F Caswell Cyrus and Darrin Hancock. CLEVELAND CAVALIERS--Signed G Michael Hawkins. INDIANA PACERS--Named Steve Yoder college scout. PHOENIX SUNS--Waived F Carlos Daniel and F Reed Rawlings. WASHINGTON WIZARDS--Released G Brandon Titus and G Milt Palacio.

HOCKEY National Hockey League FLORIDA PANTHERS--Agreed to terms with RW Paul Laus on a three-year contract extension. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Recalled RW Sheldon Keefe from Detroit of the IHL. VANCOUVER CANUCKS--Assigned C Artem Chubarov to Kansas City of the IHL. WASHINGTON CAPITALS--Recalled D Dmitri Mironov from Houston of the IHL. Re-assigned D Jakub Cutta to Swift Current of the WHL. COLLEGE CALIFORNIA--Signed Kevin Grimes, men's soccer coach, to a three-year extension.
